lenders.name: Stan & Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: We have always been enriched by sharing. If everyone shared just a little with their neighbors far and near, the world would be happier and our circle of friends would be astounding!
lenders.occupational_info: We own business brokerage and consulting business.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.occupational_info: I work to get people on TV, Radio, or Television to promote their books or organizations.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: we all need a boost up from time to time, and it's not always available. These people aren't asking for handouts, they're business people trying to build a better life for themselves and their families in places where that can be quite challenging. If I can help someone do that with just $25, I have to.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: This is a way I can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I look at how the built environment supports (or doesn't) its users, and help to design better solutions.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: by loaning rather than giving, I can help 100 people with the same ball of money, instead of just 1.  My efforts can be recycled.  Also, the recipient of the money is not burdened by the feeling of having received charity.  By repaying the loan, they keep and add to their personal dignity and their reputation.  Charity is an interaction between the high and the low.  A loan is an interaction between equals. That is very important to how people relate to each other around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my child.  I bake, cook, and tend the garden.  Next year I hope to go to graduate school and get a masters degree in environmental science, so I can do work that helps everyone.

lenders.name: Armando
lenders.loan_because: I can and should.
lenders.occupational_info: computational biologist

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: ...someone once gave me a loan and leases to grow my business.
lenders.occupational_info: I invest in high technology business in California

lenders.name: Bradley
lenders.loan_because: I have been very lucky to have all the privileges of living in the country of Canada, having a good education, extensive world travel, well paying occupation and an alumni of the Internationally acclaimed group - Up With People. Some 25 years ago, I travelled the world for 1 year building bridges of communication and understanding amongst the difference places and people of the world. Finding the Kiva organization has provided another outlet for me to continue to hopefully make a difference in other people\'s lives. It not about just giving money to someone less fortunate, it is about changing lives by giving a hard working person that has personal dignity and passion to make a better life and a break...as I have had in my life. I encourage you to get involve...and make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I work as Head of Sales Planning and Performance Management for Canada\'s largest bank. I report on sales effectiveness relative to growth targets and advise Senior Executive of YTD progress.

lenders.name: Don & Pamela
lenders.loan_because: The greater good depends upon all of us participating

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.occupation: Teacher in a Quaker school in North Carolina, USA
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to have built my dreams and I wish to help those who also have dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young children to read and to write, to learn about a diverse world, and to recognize the importance of living simply and with respect for all of life.

lenders.name: Charles & Elizabeth
lenders.occupational_info: Charlie teaches college biology and Elizabeth is the executive director of a volunteer center that connects people with opportunities to serve through a variety of programs and services for individuals, families, youth, senior citizens, and businesses.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I can and I want to.
lenders.occupational_info: I sit with people through their suffering. I also help people to remember and practice compassion for themselves and others.

lenders.name: ALLEN
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive change/opportunity for someone less fortunate than I with the sincere hope that the family/individual will become more successful in meeting their needs.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with families that are in need of counselling to improve thir parenting skills ; and with individual children and youth to improve functioning and promote positive self- esteem.

lenders.name: Giovanna
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to be in a position to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell kitchen cabinets to contractors and do it yourself home owners.

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: as individuals we have the power to make a difference.  We can lend a helping hand and lift each other out of despair.  All it takes is the desire to do so.

lenders.name: Howard-Lewis Family
lenders.loan_because: My brother and sister-in-law gave as gifts for x-mas.  This has been a great experience for our teenage daughters.  They never knew so little could make such a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an agency who provides meaningful work opportunities to adults with developmental disabilities.  My job is to write and implement a plan for that to happen as well as maintaining employment.  I address barriers to such employment and how to overcome them.

lenders.name: Narain
lenders.loan_because: i want to build an eco system of entrepreneurship across the globe, in addition, i would like to also start something similar in this nature for India
lenders.occupational_info: I run a Web application company based out of India [www.equvia.com] and we have a visual collaboration product for the ad. agencies, manufacturing, online advertising, video segments - Watch www.tracbac.com

lenders.name: Gaurav Bisht
lenders.loan_because: I know it helps
lenders.occupational_info: Manage global software development program that enable local economies

lenders.name: Glenda
lenders.loan_because: If not now, then when?                                             So much more is left to do.                        If not me, then who?
lenders.occupational_info: At home, I volunteer with an organization (Friends of the Lakeshore Nature Preserve) that helps protect, restore and take care of a local natural area.  I also participate in many service trips around the world (Philippines, Nicaragua, Guatemala, El Salvador, Mexico and Uganda).  I do wildlife fieldwork, help construct houses and water systems, work on reforestation, and help medical personnel.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderful way to enable individuals to help themselves.

lenders.name: matthew
lenders.loan_because: i should

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: if you buy a man a fish, you feed him for a day. Loan a man money to buy a fishing pole and you feed him for a lifetime, and then you get your money back to do it all over again.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 19 yr old student at Johns Hopkins University who is pursuing a career as a physician.

lenders.name: Giovanna
lenders.loan_because: I know it\'s tough to start your own business. Sometimes people need a little capital push to get things started. I really enjoy helping people with an entrepreneurial drive.
lenders.occupational_info: I am also a small business owner.

lenders.name: Ankur - Infotrex.com
lenders.occupation: CEO of Infotrex Servces Pvt. Ltd.
lenders.loan_because: I love to help entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: Email Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Internet Marketing, Personal Branding, Web Application/Web Site Development, Search Engine Optimization

lenders.name: BellaOnline.com
lenders.loan_because: BellaOnline supports charity in many ways, including donating millions of ads each month to a wide variety of charity organizations.
lenders.occupational_info: BellaOnline\'s 300+ editors each work together towards our goal of making our world a better place to live in.

lenders.name: Andréa e Gianandrea
lenders.loan_because: We think that is really important to loan to someone who's trying to build his future. These loans give hope.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because:
I remember how hard it was for me starting up my own company 10 years ago and know how hard it is to run a maintain a company in a developed country with credit cards and credit lines.
I have had the privilege to visit several under developed villages in South America (while being spoiled at All-Inclusive resorts that they work 12 hour days at spoiling us) and it is always amazing how so little CAN and DOES go so far for them and how, I do not know what the word is for us, but we are spoiled, wasteful, ungrateful and lucky and we grow up not even knowing it. And many of realize this while on vacation, and all come home to our regular lives with giving it another thought.
 I took my daughter to the Dominican when she was 11, while on a day trip going threw a little village she thought it was staged, no one could live like that! It took a whole day of several village to convince her it was real and they CAN survive ok without all we have and we have so much more than we need. As families of 3 we have 5 TV’s, 3 cell phones, 3 computers, 1 laptop ect… like most and the list goes on
I do not have much to spare, I am a single self-employed mother of 2 teenagers but I want to help. By setting aside what would amount to less that 2 pairs of jeans and a top for my daughter, $200.00, I can make a real difference to a few people who will be very thank-full, unlike the teenager who come to expect it.
lenders.occupational_info: I do bookkeeping & taxation for business and personal. I help business keep current with their government tax filing requirements and track their Income & expenses.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because:
"If you haven't got any charity in your heart, you have the worst kind of heart trouble."
Bob Hope American comedian and film actor (1903-2003)
lenders.occupational_info: My work takes me overseas and I witness first hand the struggle that many people face on a daily basis just to survive

lenders.name: Clodius Willis
lenders.loan_because: Loaning money for me is a way to travel and meet people by helping them.

lenders.name: jamie
lenders.loan_because: of the assistance I have recieved.  now I would like to give hard-working visionaries with little means the same assistance.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach intermediate language arts to 13-15 year olds.

lenders.name: Donks
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone needs help from time to time.

lenders.name: Sharie
lenders.loan_because: It gives people an opportunity to create productive community life.

lenders.name: Terrell
lenders.loan_because: I like to see everyone have a chance to strive for financial independence.
lenders.occupational_info: I setup and maintain computer networks for a Publishing Firm. I also manage of group of 5 Techs.

lenders.name: Dr. Quang
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at the University of Wisconsin in Madison!

lenders.loan_because: we love to see people follow their dreams and build better lives for their families.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: in North America, we have so much... it\'s an honour and a privilege to help someone in a developing country who needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m a freelance writer, author, and illustrator, with my latest book coming out in January 2007.

lenders.name: Robby
lenders.loan_because: We're all family, and family takes care of eachother

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: Why not let small business operators benefit from my money, rather than let it sit idle in the bank? An effortless way to change the world and the greatest geography lesson I've ever learned.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to organise arts festivals and I am the team leader of Kiva's Australia team.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I love this concept, and I can make a difference.

lenders.name: Hugh
lenders.loan_because: I think kiva.org is providing a wonderful service unavailable otherwise by enableing "lenders" to assist in building a sustainable living with those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Chief Administrative Officer with an urban community bank based in Nashville, TN.

lenders.name: Manette and Ron
lenders.loan_because: it makes us happy!

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying molecular biology and I am in the process of applying to medical school.

lenders.name: stevenj
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy assisting individuals by being a member of a socially-minded, international community -- helping to break the cycle of poverty through lending.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I believe that small loans are more productive on the scale of the individual and the community than large loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student of energy and climate sustainability.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people become empowered in their lives when money is loaned rather than given.  Giving money can be disempowering.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a non-profit environmental education organization--in the business of teaching kids to take care of our world.

lenders.name: Lesli S.
lenders.loan_because: I have been to Kenya (my parents live there) and always wanted to know how to help people be self-sufficient. This is by far the best method of helping people help themselves. I can do something from my home here in the U.S. Work hard. Be happy! I have Kenyan dust on my feet!
lenders.occupational_info: I care for our home and care for my twin boys who are 3 years old. I cook. I wash. I volunteer at church. Then I do more cooking and more washing! Smile. Before I had twin boys I was a school teacher.

lenders.name: mike+rani
lenders.loan_because: we loan because we believe in taking small steps towards big dreams.

lenders.loan_because: It's an opportunity to give to share the opportunities I have.

lenders.occupational_info: I create animated TV series for kids that like to laugh

lenders.name: Eyal
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are motivated to improve their situation throe working. I try to help as  I can.

lenders.name: benson

lenders.occupational_info: through pictures my business will be seen all over the world

lenders.name: Margaret & Stan

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to connect with other cultures, and provide a lift for those in need easily, and recycle the funds for other needy individuals.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Doctor in New York, and volunteer for many organizations to help my community. I have been involved in Rotary International for 7 years, and think that microlending through Kiva is a natural extension of our work within Rotary.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and believe that I am called to share.
lenders.occupational_info: We prepare and deliver 1300 nutritous lunches every day,  to children in Calgary schools that would otherwise do without.

lenders.name: lawrence
lenders.loan_because: of my sister's generosity of knowing how to help others.

lenders.name: LORI / ERIN
lenders.loan_because: I received my first loan money as a gift & now I'm hooked!!  It feels great to help people that I don't even know!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home Mom.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: it\'s common sense to do so! I\'m in my early twenties and still struggling to add to my savings... but the money I do have lives an idle life. Why not put it to work?

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to help transfer the wealth and power from those lucky enough to be born in the Global North to the Global South. My career is dedicated to international development, but even that is not enough.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on international development programs in Sub-Saharan Africa.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I want to participate in God\'s concern for the poor and vulnerable.  Having traveled in developing countries, I have also seen the sickening effects of poverty and want to play some part in ending this scourge.  Micro-loans are great way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach religion and philosophy at Shenandoah University in Virginia; it\'s about an hour from Washington,D.C.  In addition, I am actively involved in working for peace and justice.

lenders.loan_because: I get pleasure from helping others.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.occupation: Working! I found a great job! =)
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed financially and therefore, I want to share my blessings with others. The Bible says that to whom more is given, more is expected and that the man who helps his neighbor shall be blessed. So, why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Historic Preservation, so I study  old buildings and find out how to repair them so that the public can visit them.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: there is a need
lenders.occupational_info: Investments

lenders.name: Troels
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great way to support entrepreneurs in the developing world.

lenders.name: Jonas
lenders.loan_because: I believe that access to fair priced capital can allow some people to lift themselves out of poverty. At the same time I am certain that microfinance is not the one-cure-pill that can alleviate poverty alltogether. Development is a multiple-faced and complex thing that can not easily be achieved. However I think all should be involved in helping those less fortunate and this is definately one of the ways.

lenders.name: Lyndsey
lenders.loan_because: I want to enable entrepreneurs who have good ideas and are motivated to make their lives better and their communities stronger.

lenders.name: Churchman Family
lenders.loan_because: This is the kind of people to people contact that helps people grow.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with schools.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: We are not here merely to make a living. We are here to enrich the world

lenders.name: Greg Stephens

lenders.name: stephen
lenders.loan_because: this sound like a great idea. Loaning small amounts of money to actual people with ideas to improve themselves and their communities.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe everyone should have the chance to succeed if they so desire. We as Americans take a lot for granted. Plus, it makes me feel good!

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: because I feel that if we help one another we can change the current state of poverty and undernourishment.

lenders.name: jean-patrice
lenders.loan_because: oublier c'est humain, agir aussi :)

lenders.occupational_info: I am a builder involved in residential remodeling projects. My sister Susan helps the blind. My brother in-law Karl sells lumber. My wife Marianne works for an insurance company. My Mother Patricia is retired and helps others through the church and community by volunteering.

lenders.name: Frode Egeland
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help eradicate poverty.
This is a small step, but a positive one, towards that goal.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working as a DevTools ("DevOps") Engineer at a large Australian media company.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It\\\'s a great opportunity to make a positive impact in someone\\\'s life.

lenders.name: Michael Peachey
lenders.loan_because:
An interesting Pew Research study seems to indicate that the best predictor of feeling like you have enough is not how much you have, but how much you give to others.

Giving is ultimately a celebration of choice and control over one's path, and an acknowledgment of one's capacity to have less and need less.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to make the internet a better place for all users.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to know I am helping someone build a better life for themselves and their family and create a stronger community.

lenders.name: carol
lenders.loan_because: I can. I want to see my loan go to specific people to use for specific needs. This is a wonderful way to help people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: it is an expression of my faith. I am privileged and want to share what I have.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student pharmacist at The University of Minnesota.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected

lenders.name: Levi
lenders.loan_because: It works

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: It's easy for me to help people across the world improve their lives, I would be lazy not to do it.  The borrowers are the ones doing the hard work.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and run physics-based computer programs for scientific research.  I volunteer at a local after school program.    You can see that I lent to animal husbandry practices in the past.  I am sorry about that, but what's done is done.  Since becoming vegan, I have decided to lend only to animal-friendly business plans.  I absolutely want to encourage respect and kindness toward all animalkind, including humans.

lenders.name: jean
lenders.occupational_info: I teach law-related subjects at a local university, practice pro bono law, and also help people improve their fitness levels through exercise designed for them.

lenders.name: Impala Image Works
lenders.loan_because: Everyone can do something to make a difference - even if it's only $25.00 at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: Digital preservation of photos, journals, memoirs and documentation of art collections.

lenders.name: Blake & Britta
lenders.loan_because: my wife and I love reading the stories and supporting these entrepreneurs!
lenders.occupational_info: Studying entrepreneurship and social enterprise.

lenders.name: Dereck
lenders.loan_because: Misers do not go to the world of the gods; they do not want to give.  The wise are generous, and go to a happier world.   -Buddha-

lenders.name: Therry
lenders.loan_because: I love handbags, and the idea of helping an Eastern European man who also likes handbags is very appealing to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach a weekly class to teenagers about how to be an ethical, loving person.  I also teach a weekly class about opera.  I work for my town helping to conserve land and protect water sources. I\'m a good adventurous cook, and I can\'t get through the day without music.

lenders.name: Bruce Taylor
lenders.loan_because: Helping others out with microcredit is a fantastic idea and something I feel is not just my right, but my responsibility.  We only succeed if we all succeed.  This is also a great tool to utilize in my classroom and I incorporate it into my lessons on consumption and global economics.
lenders.occupational_info: Social Science/Science teacher with an aim on debunking a consumption based society

lenders.name: Matt, Suki, & Juno
lenders.loan_because: We know people work hard and we want to help other families around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Suki helps people with their medications and Matt writes computer software.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: lending creates accountability and motivation and improves a person's overall dignity. Charity creates a dependent mindset.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been incredibly fortunate in my life and want my second career to be focused on helping others be equally fortunate.

lenders.name: Jake and Desira
lenders.loan_because: I have it to lend and enjoy helping others get ahead

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping others in a way that provides them with dignity and self-sustainability.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who have a hard time learning at school and who have a hard time feeling happy.

lenders.name: mark
lenders.loan_because: I can\'t not.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping connect people both to one another and to the better angels of their nature.

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurship and the free market are the world's most powerful economic forces.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise businesses and resolve disputes with their employees, vendors, business partners, and the government.

lenders.name: Rafael F. Moreno
lenders.loan_because: Helping others with a passion and drive for business that will support their community in a positive manner is a social responsibility.
lenders.occupational_info: Awesome, plainly awesome.

lenders.name: Cory
lenders.loan_because: i like to root for the underdogs

lenders.name: Kristi
lenders.loan_because: I have a passion for helping others help themselves. It is a gift that will keep on giving from generation to generation, and this organization seems like an amazing opportunity for people who want to better their lives and the lives of their loved ones.
lenders.occupational_info: When children in California don't have permanent homes to live in because their parents can't take proper care of them, I help find them permanent homes where they can be loved and cared for forever.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: It is extremely important to me to help others in any way I can.  The issue of poverty is one that each of us can help solve in our own way.  Kiva is a wonderful organization that enables ordinary people to help others thousands of miles away.  It feels so great to be able to help someone achieve their goals, especially when he or she is working so hard to attain them.

lenders.name: Shedrick
lenders.occupational_info: I apply chemical and organic treatments to turf and ornamental plants. I currently work for a well known company in that field. After two years I decided to get certified to do it myself. There is great potential and I love to see the results and the satisfaction of a customer form the service. With proper treatment and sound cultural practices, I\'m confident to produce a healthy, green lawn 99% of the time.

lenders.name: Judson
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do!

lenders.name: Rebekah
lenders.loan_because: it makes me happy.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because:
I like too help other people. 
Due to MIFEX problem I can't make any new loan, because I haven´t go the money to lend out again.
lenders.occupational_info: Office work

lenders.name: Arcadi
lenders.loan_because: Wanted to help and see if it works.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer engineer

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: We all need to help better this world.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: The exorbitant affluence of a lower-middleclass American should be shared with those willing to work toward making a better life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to keep a few hectares of good habitat available to the native wildlife.

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.occupational_info: Try to understand disease and genetic related alterations in brain morphology.

lenders.name: Desire
lenders.loan_because: I want to make sure that as God blesses me I am a blessing to someone else. I don\\\'t deserve any of what little I do have.
lenders.occupational_info: I love being an illustrator. It\\\'s more than a passion. It\\\'s my lifestyle.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: This seems like an interesting alternative to charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I think, read, and write philosophical things.

lenders.name: Betty
lenders.loan_because: My son introduced me to the site on my birthday with a Kiva gift certificate. What a great gift! I am so excited to be helping these folks to provide for their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and spend a lot of my time with my grandchildren. I also help with the finance committee at my church. This work is much more fulfilling than my years employed as an accountant!

lenders.name: Southern Utah Family
lenders.loan_because: We are fellow entrepreneurs.  We began our businesses with very little capital, also.  We know how difficult it is to have a successful business, even in the best of circumstances.  We have been greatly blessed and we are now responsible to bless others. Kiva.org has given us that opportunity. Thanks to my brother and sister-in-law for telling us about this opportunity!
lenders.occupational_info: We buy, sell and lease homes in our state.  We also own an electrical contracting company which employees 30 people and provides the wiring and other technical services in order for homes and businesses to have power and electricity, telephone and other technological capabilities.

lenders.name: Cannon
lenders.loan_because: I care about helping
lenders.occupational_info:
As background, I am the Chief Executive Officer of Human Rights Initiative of North Texas (HRI).  For this letter to be effective, let me provide you further with a brief background on this agency:

History of the Organization
HRI is a nonprofit corporation that was formed in 1999 in Dallas to provide legal services to victims of human rights abuses.  The organization was created by a group of dedicated professionals and volunteers; HRI is the result of their concern for those who seek safe haven in the United States after suffering religious, social or political persecution in their homelands.  HRI also assists immigrants with special abuse issues, such as women and children victims of domestic violence.  As a natural extension of our legal representation services, HRI also assists immigrants and refugees in their struggles to make the necessary lifestyle, cultural and social adjustments after experiencing trauma and loss.

lenders.name: Torben Jensen
lenders.loan_because: It's a good way to really make a difference

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: Other people seem to be able to use my money much more wisely than I do!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find the information they need.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I would rather loan or give money to someone who is making a better  life for themselves through hard work rather than just taking money they didn\'t earn. \r\n\r\nI think this site is a fantastic idea to help people. People appreciate better what they have worked for instead of what is just given to them. I know this because I have earned the life I am living, I had plenty of help, and this seems to be a great way to help people who are trying to do what I was able to do.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others start businesses and see them succeed.  To also see them happy and control their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Design websites, traveler, MBA Student, and Entrepreneur.

lenders.name: Pam & Carroll
lenders.loan_because: Our wish to help others that work hard but have been less fortunate than us.
lenders.occupational_info: We do volunteer work.  Pam does historical and other work in our town. Her husband, Carroll, does lots of athletics officiating around the world.

lenders.name: Pamoja.org
lenders.occupation: We raise money to support microfinance in Africa
lenders.loan_because: We are a Vancouver, BC based public foundation that raises money to help increase the availability of microfinance in East Africa
lenders.occupational_info:
Pamoja Foundation's goal is to create a cycle of empowerment through both lending and donations, leading to financial self-sufficiency and the opportunity for a better future.
Feel free to donate to the link below.

lenders.name: Yahhazie
lenders.occupation: Shoshone Native American Beadwork Artist, Teacher
lenders.loan_because: the spirit of giving works for both the receiver and the giver.
lenders.occupational_info: i am an native american shoshone, and sell authentic shoshone beadwork.  i also sell beads from all around the world, most specifically Czech Glass Beads.

lenders.name: Evyatar
lenders.loan_because: those who have should give those who do not have. Simple, right?
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching in a university.

lenders.name: George &Gigi
lenders.loan_because: We are so grateful to Kiva for giving us the power to use our limited resources to make a big difference for good people who need help in other countries. Kiva is a gift to us as much as to loan recipients. We wish them all well.
lenders.occupational_info: We write  financial newsletters about China and about global dividend-paying stocks. We have each written and ghost-written books (a total of six). People who read our work hopefully use our words to find ways to invest their money profitably

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: A never ending fund for people to use for the betterment of all human kind is a No Brainer

lenders.name: Lisbeth
lenders.loan_because: The idea of Kiva is excellent! The internet is used in the very best way when it can help bringing people closer together. I loan because the Kiva-concept just seems as a very simple, transparent and effective way of supporting good intentions and development - for the benefit of all.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with administration. When not working I enjoy photographing.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving honest people a chance to change their lives for the better. They will then be able to help others later and the snowball effect will benefit many entrepeneurs and their families. In the third world there is a lot of corruption that undermines economic growth and prevent the countries from developing. The problem has always been how to find good and trustworthy people. Therefore I think we owe them our support.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: It is essential that we do everything possible to to bring together the gap between wealth and poverty to ensure peace and stablility for the future.
lenders.occupational_info: I a musician I hope to lift the spirits of those aroung me as I hope to do with this loan to you.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: This website makes it easy.

lenders.name: paul
lenders.loan_because: why not?

lenders.name: Kris
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: To set an example for my grandchildren.  They are becoming involved and learning the pleasure of helping others.

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because: I like supporting something I think is important, and feeling that I am a part of something bigger than myself.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: Love helping people who are trying to make their lives stusainable through agriculture;)
lenders.occupational_info: I am in distribution sales of veterinairan drugs, supplies, equipment and vaccines. Now a second year Vet Student at Colorado State UNiversity.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Lending a hand across the world is effective and rewarding. Thanks Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student of best business practices and how to apply them to social goals

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: I expect to make a profit. And I think it's great that I can do so while helping others at the same time.
lenders.occupational_info: I build lasers that are used in industrial etching and cutting.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I want to share some of the success I have been blessed to achieve with other people so that they might enjoy some success of their own.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a regional 911 center as an emergency dispatcher.

lenders.name: Raena
lenders.loan_because: I think most people just need that one break in their life to get ahead and stand on their own two feet.  This site is a wonderful opportunity for people on both ends to give and to recieve and both can be challenging at times. I think the work done here is important and I am honored to be a Member of Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find homes they love, or make money through investment properties and flips.  I love what I do !

lenders.name: Roni
lenders.loan_because: I want to make good
lenders.occupational_info: I am a peace and environment activist, and I live in Israel.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I see the effects of poverty on a daily basis and as individuals we can make a difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to stabilize families in need who present with numerous challenges and in addition, strengths.

lenders.name: Gianluca
lenders.loan_because: I understand the passion of an entrepreneur and the challenge of raising funds.

lenders.name: ebenezer
lenders.loan_because: I am a founder of Global youth for Peace Club based in Accra-Ghana, My mission is to find and support the rural sick, hiv, orphans, farming to support the hungry, training the youths at conflict areas in Ghana and other parts of africa with the funds i raise from you lenders.\r\nWe cherish you Godly support for the needy people in Africa.\r\nGod and Allah bless us all AmeN!
lenders.occupational_info: Though iam a professional designer i took it upon myself as one duty to support and help the needy in all sphers of live. I go round and communicate with people all over Africa.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want others to have a chance to be successful in their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I search for oil and gas.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: People working together to help other people can make a big difference. I'm glad Kiva provides the opportunity to all of us.

lenders.name: trace
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in live and people should help one another.
lenders.occupational_info: Boring.  I sit at a computer in an office all day.  I wish to be a writer.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help others improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide services to firms to assist them in complying with environmental regulations.  Specifically, I manage projects that involve collecting groundwater and soil samples that are analyzed to determine if the media has been effected by the clients business.  I then work with the client to address the impacts.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: The system is most efficient.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in high tech electronics

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.occupational_info: I make wooden boxes, jewelry and accessories

lenders.name: Trenton
lenders.loan_because: microcredit, while not a panacea, is the most powerful intervention we have for sustainable poverty alleviation.

lenders.name: Trent
lenders.loan_because: I want them to have enough.
lenders.occupational_info: I am ten.  My other mom Sabrina helped me start lending at Kiva.  I like the color black.  I am good at karate.

lenders.name: Meg
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people, especially other women, to realize their own goals.  Also, I am very grateful for all the hospitality and kindness I\'ve been shown by people during my various stays in East Africa - in Marsabit and Mombasa in Kenya, and in Arusha and Dar in Tanzania.  I hope to keep returning, and am invested in many ways in this wonderful part of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student of literature (especially African literature) and women's studies.  I like to think about things like how using certain languages helps people talk about their identity, and where people get their unconscious assumptions about the world.

lenders.name: Tisa
lenders.loan_because: it helps to satisfy a market failure, giving people and communities a chance that they wouldn't have otherwise had.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in school working toward a master's degree in public policy.

lenders.name: Luke
lenders.occupational_info: I help nonprofit organizations use the Internet for fund raising, advocacy, and communications.

lenders.name: Lauren and Michael
lenders.loan_because: it feels good.

lenders.name: Ali Cherkaoui
lenders.loan_because:
I strongly feel as a world citizen. But it has not always been like this : Born and raised in casablanca, morocco until the age of 19, i was lucky enough to study and start making a living in paris and around the world...
I deeply believe that i have a responsibility in the world that we live in.
Feeling and expressing compassion is not enough and it's important to start using [active solidarity] to help people to pull themselves out of poverty.
The day i discovered the Kiva website, was a great day in my life and i intend to use it as often as i can, to support other citizens of this world who deserve as much as me a decent life for them, their families and their children...
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in the film industry as a first assistant director...
I organize film shoots, establish the shooting schedule, coordinate the different departments and run the set, day after day...
It's an intense and passionate job that is also full of Human Experiences with different people, different cultures and nations.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference because God has blessed us!

lenders.name: John Shapiro
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe that all people deserve the opportunity to make a better life for themselves.  I feel blessed to have had so much opportunity growing up in the United States, and I am thankful to be able to play a small part in giving other folks an opportunity that seems like makes a real difference in their life. I really like the Kiva.org concept as it seems very direct/efficient/personal/not wasteful.  This system seems like it truly creates opportunity for people to improve their circumstances who might not otherwise have that chance, all via their own efforts and work.
lenders.occupational_info: For work, I teach guitar and voice lessons from my home.  I plan to move into doing nonprofit creation/consulting in the not to distant future and am currently spend much of my non teaching time founding/creating a nonprofit: CooperativeAction.org is: A nonprofit organization that uses an interactive website to facilitate participation among individuals to solve commonly agreed upon issues through cooperative action..  We are not up and running yet but should be by April 2007

lenders.name: joshua & stella
lenders.loan_because: We want to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: Joshua is a specialist on diamonds, colored stones, watches and all jewelery. Stella is a manufacturer of jewelry.

lenders.name: Eli
lenders.loan_because: I support the idea of empowering people to improve their situation for the long term.    Micro finance is not a hand out that provides temporary relief...it is a tool that enables people to achieve their dream of a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the chief lawyer for a company that provides medical services.

lenders.name: Wayne and Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I believe in enriching people\'s lives and empowering them to live their dreams through the delivery of capital they might not otherwise have access to.

lenders.name: Jacob Singh
lenders.loan_because: I've got enough, and micro lending is typically more successful than straight away charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I make websites for ngos and people I believe in.

lenders.name: Kathleen & Scott
lenders.loan_because: Life has blessed us in many ways, and to whom much is given, much is expected.  We are honored to have this opportunity to share.
lenders.occupational_info: Kathleen writes books for children and teens.  Scott sells software.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: It\'s the right thing to do.  If I can make the world better and help someone create a business that will provide for themselves and their families I want to help them to achieve that goal.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people get loans to purchase or refinance homes.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: Just a small investment (in US terms) can be the "tipping point" for an entrepreneur in so many places around the world. The difference between real success and stagnation can be as little as being able to buy some supplies with enough left over to realize a profit.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small non-profit businesses organize information about their clients and supporters. My focus is on small organizations that help improve other people's lives.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: I can, because I'm thankful for what I have, and because I respect hardwork and integrity. Everyone deserves a chance to make something for themselves and If I can help, I will.

lenders.name: Marriah
lenders.loan_because: It helps those in need and it helps me save money simultaneously. I love win-win situations.
lenders.occupational_info: I study and teach political science as I work toward obtaining my Ph.D.

lenders.name: AKOS & KLAUDIA
lenders.loan_because: Helping the disadvantaged is not only an awesome feeling, but it is the right thing to do, if you are blessed enough to be able to help... and if you can afford a pizza for yourself, then you can probably afford to help the poor. Consider this: while a pizza will only feed you for a day (?) donating the price of that pizza may help to feed a family for life... Plus you need to cut back on your calories anyways.  ;)
lenders.occupational_info: FEELGOOD INVESTOR   [fiːl•ɡʊd ɪn'ves•tər] [noun]  definition: somebody who commits monetary instruments only to help people in need - a person, company, or other organization that has money invested, merely to help people in need, without expecting any financial returns, but a happy face.

lenders.name: Lars K.
lenders.loan_because: I believe empowering individuals is one of several good ways to create development in Africa

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I believe in free enterprise. Business creates jobs, jobs free people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others sell their goods or services.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: l like the idea the 100% of the ammount goes to people who needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: l am the co-owner of an carpenter / constructionfirm with 35 employees

lenders.name: Hanny
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: zoo animal registration, transport, studbooks

lenders.name: Patricia & Maarten
lenders.loan_because: KIVA´s micro-credit service is a great iniative that allows individuals such as us to support small enterprises across the world with small loans. We have previously loaned to a food production/sales store in Nigeria,  a clothing store in Ghana, a cattle farm and a wine farm in Azerbaijan, to name a few. All businesses repaid their loans within a year with small monthly payments. With only a few hundred dollars we have already loaned to more than 25 individuals and groups across the world.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: it allows me to connect in a direct and personal way with people in other parts of the world and to help them fulfill their entrepreneurial dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I run the legal department in an acute care hospital system called Lahey Clinic. It is based just outside of Boston, Massachusetts, USA. There are real estate, employment, regulatory, contractual and other issues at Lahey Clinic that require the help of lawyers. The members of the legal department provide that help.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to support themself and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I research medicine for cancer.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.occupational_info: I help organisations to perform better, mostly in the public sector.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: It is a good thing to do, and you can help people in need.  Also many people are less fourtunate than me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at Walnut Hills High School.  The subjects I take range from Band to Latin.

lenders.name: Toine+Annemarie
lenders.loan_because: Be true to yourself and you ll never fall.............
lenders.occupational_info: Lawyer

lenders.name: Scott Asch
lenders.loan_because: Power to the People!
lenders.occupational_info: Id rather be windsurfing.

lenders.name: Kent
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a farm
lenders.occupational_info: I am a twice retired farmer engineering  and then from farming in Virgina

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: God has taken care of us and we want to take care of others because of His love...

lenders.name: Carol Cisecki
lenders.loan_because: Today is my first step to helping my neighbours around the world.

lenders.name: Avoco AS
lenders.loan_because: We understand the need of financing when starting up a business. This is a brilliant way to assist other people in arhchieving their plans for a better future for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Founders of computer programming company.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because:
We all go to heaven on the wings of those  we've helped.
-Kerouac

lenders.name: Stefano
lenders.loan_because: I think that helping others to grow is a fair use of our small and great wealth
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a network builder in Italy and all over the world together with my wife

lenders.name: Dave Higgs-Vis
lenders.loan_because: I was born into privilege. I don't believe I'm special because of it. Rather, I think we have all been born into abundance. I have the opportunity to share what I have been given, and I give thanks that I can. Jah Bless!
lenders.occupational_info: I make food. I like to make simple food. I believe that the ingredients should be the focus. These ingredients should be fresh and local.

lenders.name: sara
lenders.loan_because: it feels right to me
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an agency committed to ending violence. Our work helps those who have been abused and provides education on violence prevention .

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It\\\'s great to be able to help ordinary people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently training to be a minister (priest) in the Church of England.

lenders.name: Julie Seidell
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to be able to help people who are working to make their own lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: self employed jewelry designer.

lenders.name: Morten
lenders.loan_because: It’s great to know where your money goes - and to get feedback on the success. Also, I believe that loans increases the feeling of responsibility in the loan taker. Hence, it is a better aid than just giving the money away.

lenders.name: The Bray Family
lenders.loan_because: We are reaching our children the act of giving and empowering people.
lenders.occupational_info: We donate as a family and hope our small loan makes a big difference

lenders.name: Dale
lenders.loan_because: I was once helped by someone who owed me nothing and I wish to pass along the favor.
lenders.occupational_info: I write about motorcycles and travel. I help people prepare their motorcycles for journeys around my country and around the world.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer for The Nature Conservancy.

lenders.name: Philip & Jenisel
lenders.loan_because: We all need help to realize our dreams.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.occupational_info: I work with dental patients that suffer from disease of the gums to help them learn how important it is to properly take care of the surrounding tissues of the their teeth.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to make a difference in people's lives $25 at a time. There's just no good reason not to!

lenders.name: Corrie
lenders.loan_because: I feel that one of the best ways to support economic equality and responsible commerce is to support small and family-owned businesses-- at home as well as abroad. If that support can also help a family improve its economic situation or quality of life, all the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an educator for kids, teaching them about animals and the environment.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: It sounds like a cool thing to do in the why not category. It makes me happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English Second Language and run a comedy website

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I am aware that what little I have to share can be a great amount for someone else. I am lucky my country is stable and has a strong currency. I know I am fortunate to be able to work to take care of myself and I appreciate the entrepreneurial desires of the kiva community of borrowers.
lenders.occupational_info: I drive to my client\'s home and set up my massage bed/table. I place sheets and a blanket on it. I turn on relaxing music and leave the room to wash my hands while the client climbs onto the table. I return and, using sesame oil, I massage their head, arms, hands, legs, feet, back, and hips, one part at a time. I leave the room to wash again while the client gets up and puts on a robe. Then the client pays me & I take my table and drive to the next client.

lenders.name: Brent & Heather
lenders.loan_because: ...of a Frontline World piece we saw on Kiva.  Govermental (top-down) influence is clearly not enough to create positive change in the developing world.  Person-to-person (bottom-up) assistance in any form is needed, and Kiva is a great example.
lenders.occupational_info: Heather is in the process of starting her own business - an exercise studio - so she is living first-hand the difficulties involved.  Brent has worked for various internet companies for over 10 years, and he sees Kiva as a wonderful application of internet technology.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to be able to help people that know what they want to do, but just do not yet have the resources to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for the Information Technology Infrastructure in a major hotel in Chicago.
